short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced auto-refresh with multiple URL support and customizable options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Advanced Auto Refresh extension offers users a powerful way to automatically refresh multiple web pages with customizable options. Key features include:

• Set up auto-refresh for multiple URLs simultaneously
• Customize refresh intervals for each page
• Options to bypass cache, scroll to bottom after refresh, and show notifications
• Ability to create new tabs for pages that aren't currently open
• Easy management of active refreshes through the popup interface
• Customizable default settings and keyboard shortcuts

This extension is ideal for users who need to monitor frequently updating web pages, such as:

• Stock traders tracking market changes
• Social media managers following trending topics
• IT professionals monitoring system statuses
• News reporters staying up-to-date with breaking stories
• Online shoppers watching for product restocks or price changes

By automating the refresh process, users can save time and ensure they always have the most current information without manual intervention. The extension's flexibility allows it to adapt to various use cases, making it a valuable tool for both personal and professional use.

The user-friendly interface, coupled with advanced features like concurrent refresh limits and keyboard shortcuts, makes it suitable for both casual users and power users who require precise control over their browsing experience.
